Class RageItem

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.utils.game.GameObject
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.items.Item
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.items.RageItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
IItem, IGameObject
public class RageItem extends Item
Represents a freeze item that can be used to freeze enemies. Only one freeze item can be active at a time.

    • resetLevel

      public void resetLevel()
      Description copied from interface: IGameObject
      Resets the game object to its initial state. Used when loading / resting the level. It will clear all the static variables if the class uses them. (Like the total number of coins collected, etc.)
      Specified by:
      resetLevel in interface IGameObject
      Overrides:
      resetLevel in class GameObject
